title: Did Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene Say ‘Jewish Lasers’ Caused California Wildfires?
subtitle: The Republican representative from Georgia has endorsed QAnon conspiracy theories, among others.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: U.S. Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene of Georgia speculated that the real culprit behind the November 2018 wildfires in California may have been a Jewish laser beam from space.
